sogou-gaokao.cn: 班; 班级[出现8次)];(社会的)阶级[出现1次)];等级; 舱位等级[出现0次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 一节课; 系列课程[出现312次)];班级[出现129次)]

1.en: After Albert made it out of my class, something interesting happened.
1.cn: 在艾伯特顺利地通过这门课程，从我的课堂上离开之后，有趣的事情发生了。

2.en: When automatic detection is in use, a machine is considered server-class if it has at least two CPUs and two gigabytes of physical memory.
2.cn: 在使用自动探测时，如果一台机器拥有至少两个CPU和2GB物理内存，就会把它当成服务器。

3.en: We, students of class 11, are just like this pigeon, ready to expand our wings and fly to the vast blue sky!
3.cn: 我们11班的所有同学也正像这只鸽子一样，正蓄势待发地展开双翅，飞向辽阔的蓝天！

0.cn: 这个班上的人都是沉睡者。

1.en: Okay, everybody. We have a new student in class today.
1.cn: 好啦，各位，今天我们班上来了位新同学。

2.en: But I was also first in my radar class in the Navy, and that was a class of 20. Can I say something?
2.cn: 我在海军服役时是雷达班的第一名，那个班里有20人。我能说几句吗?

3.en: Nelly Yuki, top in our class, summer schooled at the Sorbonne.
3.cn: 奈莉·幽奇，我们班的第一名，暑假在索邦神学院补习。

4.en: And, also, about this opening in Miss Sparrow's class that you suggested for Lily.
4.cn: 另外...有关您推荐给莉莉的斯帕萝老师的班。

5.en: At my graduation, my class cheered for the PhD students, and then booed the business school.
5.cn: 我毕业时，我们班为博士生欢呼，然后嘘了商学院。

6.en: Yeah, but there's a whole class of freshmen. Why do you think they picked out just you?
6.cn: 确实，但是这儿有一个班的新生，那你们觉得他们为什么只针对你们？

7.en: Top of her class, Cambridge University. Licensed to practice law in three countries and your face.
7.cn: 她们班的尖子生，剑桥大学，在三个国家有律师执业许可，直接KO你。

8.en: Penny started taking a class. She wrote a paper, she didn't want me to read it, I went behind her back and I read it anyway.
8.cn: 佩妮报读了一个班，她写了篇论文，但不给我看，但我背着她偷偷看完了。

9.en: But this is not that. You're in over your head, Kevin Pearson. I mean, if you really want to do this, then go home, find a class, get some training.
9.cn: 但你演电视剧和这里是两码事。你的能力不够，凯文·皮尔森，如果你真想演这个，就回家去，报个班，学习一下。

10.en: Nah, I can't. I got to pick up my mom from her water aerobics class. 18 overweight women flapping their arm fat in a swimming pool. Looks like the manatee tank at Sea World.
10.cn: 我不行，我要去水中有氧运动班接我妈。十八个超重妇女在游泳池里甩着肥大的手臂，就像海洋世界里的海牛。

11.en: All right, on Thursday evening, she attended a study group for her biology class. Do you know anything about that? She's probably in AP Bio, right? Yes, she is. Yeah, no, I'm in regular.
11.cn: 好的，礼拜四晚上，她参加了生物课的学习小组。你知道吗？她应该是在预修生物的班，对吧？对，她是。嗯，我在上普通生物。

12.en: First in your class in school? High school? Yes, sir. How many in the class? Twelve. It was a small town. I'll say.
12.cn: 克里斯，你在班上是第一名? 高中？是的，先生班上一共多少人? 12人，那是个小镇。我就说嘛。

13.en: He must have been a real pleasure to have in class.
13.cn: 跟他同班上课一定很衰。

14.en: There's this kid in my class who said he's in love with me. Whoa.
14.cn: 我班上的学生说他爱上我了。哇。

15.en: Just so you know, I am the only one in my class who does not have one.
15.cn: 告诉你一声，我们班里只有我没手机。

16.en: Sting has a son that goes there too. Yeah I know, he's in Ben's class.
16.cn: 史汀有个儿子也在那里念书。我知道，他跟班是同班同学。

17.en: Well maybe he'll get to go soon, you know, like on a class trip or something.
17.cn: 也许他快要有机会了，像班级旅行什么的。

18.en: So? So I can handle one. You probably forgot but, I was top of my class at the academy.
18.cn: 所以呢？我可以负责一起，您可能忘了，我毕业时是班里第一名。

19.en: Remember the class play? You pulled up my skirt and the entire auditorium saw my underpants.
19.cn: 记得班上的话剧吗？你掀我的裙子，全礼堂的人都看到我的内裤了。
